channel.title: Read!?!?! quick lol
channel.description:
Heya all moparscape viewers,
Here are my questions;
1) How do you fix the pile bug thing, like when theres 20 ppl standing on one spot you can only see options for top person if u right click. How do i fix this?
2) What do i search to find the thing about making attack the first option if ur higher lvl. and second option if ur lowest.
Please help, and don't flame or spam.
-- Thanks for taking the time to read my topic --
(ps, sorry for double post but u guys dont read lol)

item.title: Read!?!?! quick lol
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e1 M,i,K,e_
item.description:
@M_i_K_e1 wrote:

Question 1: How do you fix the pile bug thing, like when theres 20 ppl standing on one spot you can only see options for top person if u right click. How do i fix this?

Answer 1: The server probably has Jagex items, which requires a custom client or Miss Silabsoft’s, and someone else may be on a different client from which the Jagex items are on, such as MoparScape client,
Answer 2: On a lot of clients some items are glitched, such as, agility cape on Miss Silabsofts’ client, so yeah.

Read full topic
